desc: SINGAPORE: South Korea’s President Lee Jae Myung will make a state visit to Singapore from Sunday (Mar 1) to Tuesday, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (MFA) announced on Saturday. title: Paramount CEO used political ties, deep pockets to buy Warner Bros
desc: After the board of Warner Bros Discovery Inc concluded a meeting on Thursday afternoon, chief executive officer David Zaslav called David Ellison and Ted Sarandos to let them know the results. The board had deemed Ellison and Paramount Skydance Corp’s latest bid superior to that of Netflix Inc and Sarandos.
